row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.SCRIPT.TEMPLATE.SAVE_AZURE_CONNECTION
row.description: Saves an Azure subscription if connection was successful

row.process:
! Publishing Connection info to VARA object if connection successful
! Check if existing connection to be overwritten :IF &UC4RB_AZR_OVERWRITE_CONN# EQ "true" : PRINT "connection created or updated with name &UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" : PUT_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS" , "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" :ELSE : SET &TEMP# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS", "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#") : IF &TEMP# EQ "" : PRINT "new connection created with name &UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" : PUT_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS" , "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" , "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" : ELSE : SET &STATUSFLAG# = "false" : PRINT "connection already exist with name &UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#" : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
